sentences.en: After the pain of defeat passes, England have some thinking to do.
sentences.cn: 失败的痛苦过去以后，英国人应该认真反思一下。

sentences.en: England's footballers are back home after their ill-fated trip to Algeria.
sentences.cn: 英格兰足球队结束了倒霉的阿尔及利亚之行，回到了国内。

sentences.en: He had returned to England in an aircraft carrier no less.
sentences.cn: 他竟然坐航空母舰回的英格兰。

sentences.en: He recognized the coast of England through a veil of mist.
sentences.cn: 透过薄雾他认出了那是英格兰的海岸线。

sentences.en: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
sentences.cn: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

sentences.en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentences.cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentences.en: He was soon one of the most celebrated young painters in England.
sentences.cn: 不久他就成了英格兰最负盛名的年轻画家之一。

sentences.en: He will shortly become the fulcrum of the England team.
sentences.cn: 他不久就会成为英格兰队的支柱。

sentences.en: He won the decider which completed England's 3-2 victory over Austria.
sentences.cn: 他取得了决赛局的胜利，帮助英格兰最终以3：2战胜奥地利。

sentences.en: I don't think he could do himself justice playing for England.
sentences.cn: 我认为他为英格兰队效力时不可能充分发挥自己的水平。

sentences.en: In a warm-up game for the World Cup, Uruguay have beaten England.
sentences.cn: 在世界杯热身赛中，乌拉圭队打败了英格兰队。

sentences.en: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
sentences.cn: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

sentences.en: The Bank of England seems determined to wind up the company.
sentences.cn: 英格兰银行似乎决心要关闭这家公司。

sentences.en: The company, New England Electric, burns coal to generate power.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰电力公司用煤发电。

sentences.en: We study English every day. So of course we should know something about England.
sentences.cn: 我们每天都学习英语，因此我们当然应该知道一些有关英国的事。

trans.tran_en: a division of the United Kingdom
